I have some MFC applications which are all EXEs. Every application is either a Dialog based or a MDI applications.
MFC code that each of these applications carries is huge.

I would like to make one thing clear that, I do not want to include some WPF controls in my MFC applications, instead I want to create a complete WPF GUI and then re-direct all the events generated from WPF controls to my MFC code.

Now, I am planning to change only the GUI or front-end of all of these applications. For this I thought, WPF provides best GUI design features and hence I decided to create GUIs for my applications using XAML.

Please help me how do I make use of these GUIs for my respective applications. If available, please point me to some example.

 

regards,
